Title: NN Adam Optimizer
Description: Port of Dx12NN (neural network on the GPU) by Jakub Boksansky to Gigi. See https://github.com/boksajak/Dx12NN for the original implementation. See https://boksajak.github.io/blog/DeepLearning for a write up on the original implementation
Author: Randall Rauwendaal
